# Getting started with Plotly.js

[Plotly](https://plotly.com/javascript/) is a powerful charting library for Javascript. It offers scatter plots, line charts, statistical charts, contour plots, 3d charts and much more. It is the perfect tool for visualizations in data science applications.

In this example we will create a simple line chart. For that we will import the "cartesian" module of plotly.
